ingredients: 3 tablespoons coconut oil or canola oil
1 small onion cut into ½-inch dice (about 1 cup)
1½- to 2-inch piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated or minced
¼ cup vegetable broth or coconut milk
2 large or 4 medium russet potatoes (about 1½ pounds), peeled, cut into 1½- to 2-inch cubes (about 3 cups)
1 small head of cauliflower, cut or broken into small florets (about 3 cups)
½ cup frozen, shelled edamame or petite peas
